text: Congratulations to the @warriors on their 4th championship in 8 years!
Thrilled to see Levi Stadium in Santa Clara chosen to host the @FIFAWorldCup in 2026! I look forward to cheering alongside our community in the South Bay.

Today, San Jose and the Bay Area gathered to honor one of my personal heroes, Secretary Norm Mineta.  

As described by President Bill Clinton, “Mineta spent a lifetime trying to be a builder, not a breaker. A uniter, not a divider.” He will be deeply missed. https://t.co/RrQwXFdJNJ

Stealthing is a violation of trust and a dangerous form of sexual assault. 

@NormaJTorres, @RepMaloney, and I are working to support survivors and create a path for legal action.

Putin’s invasion of Ukraine is driving a severe global fertilizer shortage causing food prices to rise. 

The House just passed the Lower Food and Fuel Costs Act, which includes my amendment to help lower costs for farmers and hardworking Americans. https://t.co/W30my0NikA

UPDATE: My town hall will be rescheduled for Tuesday, June 21st at 6pm PT / 9pm ET. 

RSVP here: https://t.co/IZMMKESzYx

In building a multiracial coalition, @unitethepoor is rejecting propaganda from elite, wealthy interests, and opening the door to justice. If there's anything that's going to change this country, it's what they're doing. https://t.co/bypIWHkFD4

Thanks to @UniteThePoor, @RevDrBarber & @liztheo for leading a powerful discussion about ending poverty and inequality in our country. 

Let's pass @RepBarbaraLee & @RepJayapal’s Third Reconstruction resolution to center the needs of 140 million low-income people in our country. https://t.co/jUPwwdtyB4
@RepCasten My heart breaks for you and your family. This is a beautiful tribute.

Why did this country think that shipping jobs offshore was a good economic strategy? It's past time we brought manufacturing and good-paying jobs back to the US. Thanks to @CWAUnion for inviting me to speak today. https://t.co/7BjhMxbUnM

A conditions-free photo op with MBS only emboldens this dictator who's behind countless civilian deaths in Yemen & the hacking to death of a Washington Post journalist. 

Any meeting should be predicated on bringing the war in Yemen to a close & permanently lifting the blockade.
This is exactly why we need to pass the PRO Act. The PRO Act will make it easy to unionize without disinformation and intimidation campaigns targeting vulnerable workers based on their identity.
Raise the wage and make the ultra-wealthy pay more in taxes.

Thanks to @PikettyLeMonde for joining me today for a thoughtful conversation with my @USProgressives colleagues on tackling massive wealth inequality through a massive investment in education and a wealth tax.

On average, Black student loan borrowers have 50% more debt after graduation than their white peers. 

Canceling student debt is a matter of racial and economic justice. It's time, @POTUS.

Join me on Thursday, June 16th at 6pm PT / 9pm ET for a Facebook Live Town Hall where I'll discuss the latest on gun reform legislation and what Congress can do to lower costs for hardworking Americans. RSVP here: https://t.co/IZMMKFabn7 https://t.co/QiACzx0HW1

Every worker deserves the opportunity to join a union and organize for a fairer workplace. 

Glad to see @Microsoft respecting that right and reaching an agreement with @CWAUnion. Good to see innovative business and labor leaders working together.
Medicare for All will save lives and cut spending on healthcare by billions every year. It’s good policy and the right thing to do.

On the 6th anniversary of the Pulse nightclub shooting in Orlando, we remember the 49 people who were tragically killed. 

During Pride Month & every month, let's work to protect the rights & safety of LGBTQ+ people across the country. That includes passing meaningful gun reform.

Today, we mark Women Veterans Day, an opportunity to celebrate and remember the women who have served to protect America’s national security and founding ideals. Our nation is stronger because of them. https://t.co/gxSGcU3nC9
